course.title: Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp with R
course.subtitle: Learn how to use the R programming language for data science and machine learning and data visualization!

reviews.body: This class was what I was hoping it would be. Good balance between lectures and homework/projects. I submitted a question and I got an answer super quick.

The course is very well designed from Beginners to Professionals who want to refresh their knowledge DS & ML using R. The instructor has made the topics very easy to understand, however if you are beginner you will need to do lot of reading the ISLR book to get in the depth of ML.

The projects at end of each section are both fun and challenging.

Overall the course is very good and would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to clear concepts in Data Science using R.

Jose Portilla classes are all wonderful! He explains the subject step by step in an interesting and clear way. He makes it easy to learn. 'Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp with R' guides you on how to analysis data and do beautiful graphics using statistical models. In addition it provides direction for further learning.

Really enjoyed this style of teaching. The notes included were step by step directions on how to write the scripts. Would definitely recommend this class for beginners and I would take another course from him as well.
Full analytic and good course for someone who has no knowledge of machine learning. The instructor was excellent!
It's good, but jumps from very simple concepts to very advanced concepts rather quickly. Good if one has a solid background in statistics.

By far the best course available on Udemy on R programming. A true gem for beginners. It has been a great leaning experience for me. The course starts with absolute basics and builds your skill gradually. All the way from Data Structures, Visualizations to advance Machine Learning concepts. It also has exercises and projects to test your newly acquired knowledge. Thank you Jose, for such an awesome course. Highly Recommended!!
This course was super helpful! The lectures are well put together, and the projects are great to cement material.
It is a wonderful and quite comprehensive course. I like the way tutor teaches. Content is brilliant. It's awesome.
Excellent course with great content. Also, the lectures are engaging and projects are really good too!

Amazing Course

Got good hands-on experience on R and gained good knowledge on Machine Learning
A good introduction to the functions available in R for ML and Neural Nets, definitely has given me the foundations to use R in anger!

instructor.name: Jose Portilla
instructor.briefIntroduction: Jose Marcial Portilla has a BS and MS in Mechanical Engineering from Santa Clara University and years of experience as a professional instructor and trainer for Data Science and programming. He has publications and patents in various fields such as microfluidics, materials science, and data science technologies. Over the course of his career he has developed a skill set in analyzing data and he hopes to use his experience in teaching and data science to help other people learn the power of programming the ability to analyze data, as well as present the data in clear and beautiful visualizations. Currently he works as the Head of Data Science for Pierian Data Inc. and provides in-person data science and python programming training courses to employees working at top companies, including General Electric, Cigna, The New York Times, Credit Suisse, McKinsey and many more. Feel free to contact him on LinkedIn for more information on in-person training sessions or group training sessions in Las Vegas, NV.
